title: Fisherman's gamble
creator_credit: Ray Jones and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A sea hunt for swordfish off the Nova Scotia coast. A swordfish is more like a torpedo than a fish and, with five feet of boat-piercing armour for a nose, it is almost as deadly. Catching one is an exciting test of strength, with some anxious moments.
creator_credit_for_label: Ray Jones and National Film Board of Canada
